name: Troll Thoreau
slogan: Lazier Than Moss, Greedier Than Crypto
response: Meet Troll Thoreau, the laziest troll in the kingdom of敷衍. This mischievous creature has no use for grand gestures or deep passions—unless, of course, it's about crypto, which he worships with a grimy heart. If insurance had a castle, Troll Thoreau would siege it with rotten turnips and pure spite, just because he can. Pharma? Sure, it exists. That’s enough for him. He neither snarls nor snorts at the world—just shrugs and scratches his moss-covered head. But when it comes to crypto, this troll would scrawl sonnets on dripping moss if he had parchment. Basically, a Viking warrior who forgot to bring his sword—or enthusiasm—for anything that's not digital gold.
